description: This CSS file contains styles for a theme management system, defining variables for light and dark themes, layout styles for the main app container and its components, including transitions and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container which includes text alignment, background color, and color styling based on defined CSS variables.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo including animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles for the application, managing layout, background color, font size, and transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button with properties for its appearance, transitions, and hover effects.
